description: Split text into chunks based on specified criteria.

data_inputs.info: The data with texts to split in chunks.

chunk_overlap.info: Number of characters to overlap between chunks.

chunk_size.info: The maximum length of each chunk. Text is first split by separator, then chunks are merged up to this size. Individual splits larger than this won't be further divided.

text_key.info: The key to use for the text column.

keep_separator.info: Whether to keep the separator in the output chunks and where to place it.

warnings.invalid_list_item: Item at index {index} is not a Data object (type: {type}), skipping

errors.docs_to_data_failed: Failed to convert documents to Data objects: {error}
errors.no_valid_data_in_list: No valid Data inputs found in list

logs.single_data_converted: Converted single Data object to document
logs.list_converted: Converted {count} valid Data objects from list of {total} items
logs.splitter_configured: Text splitter configured - separator: {separator}, chunk_size: {chunk_size}, chunk_overlap: {chunk_overlap}, keep_separator: {keep_separator}
